text: Mortification is a Christian extreme metal band from Australia. The band was formed in 1987 as Lightforce but changed its name in 1990. They inspired many people as one of the first successful Christian death metal bands from Australia. == Current members == *Steve Rowe - singer and bassist *Michael Jelinic - guitarist *Andrew Esnouf - drummer *Lincoln Bowen - backing vocals == Reference == == Other websites == *Official website Category:Australian heavy metal bands Category:Christian metal bands Category:Thrash metal bands Category:Groove metal bands Category:Musical groups from Melbourne
title: Mortification
